markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Hazanui Karū leads the Rauataian forces in the region. Through the Royal Deadfire Company, Rauatai has territories around the archipelago. That makes the hazanui - and her people - a power of note. ## Walkthrough * This quest can be started either upon witnessing the meeting between faction delegates in [Kahanga Palace](/kahangaPalace/) (where you are first introduced to [Maia Rua](/maiaRua/)), or during general dialogue with [Queen Onekaza II](/queenOnekazaIi/). * To complete the quest, simply head to the [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/) and talk to the [Hazanui](/hazanuiKaru/). * Speak to [Atsura](/atsura/) downstairs to start the next RDC quest [Dim Prospects](/dimProspects/), and the overarching quest [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC00_Meet_RDC.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Brass Empire''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | I met Hazanui Karū of the Royal Deadfire Company at the palace. It might be worthwhile to follow up with her. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with the hazanui at the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Hazanui Karū leads the Rauataian forces in the region. Through the Royal Deadfire Company, Rauatai has territories around the archipelago. That makes the hazanui - and her people - a power of note. It may be in my best interest to meet with her to see where our interests converge. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Hazanui Karū's office is at the back of Imperial Command. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I've met with the hazanui. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | The Royal Deadfire Company wants nothing more to do with me, so I won't be reporting back to them anytime soon. |}

Through the Royal Deadfire Company, Rauatai has territories around the archipelago. That makes the hazanui - and her people - a power of note. ==Walkthrough== * This quest can be started either upon witnessing the meeting between faction delegates in [[Kahanga Palace]] (where you are first introduced to [[Maia Rua]]), or during general dialogue with [[Queen Onekaza II]]. * To complete the quest, simply head to the [[Imperial Command]] and talk to the [[Hazanui Karū|Hazanui]]. * Speak to [[Atsura]] downstairs to start the next RDC quest [[Dim Prospects]], and the overarching quest [[The Storms of Poko Kohara]]. ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC00_Meet_RDC.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''The Brass Empire''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | I met Hazanui Karū of the Royal Deadfire Company at the palace. It might be worthwhile to follow up with her. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with the hazanui at the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Hazanui Karū leads the Rauataian forces in the region. Through the Royal Deadfire Company, Rauatai has territories around the archipelago. That makes the hazanui - and her people - a power of note. It may be in my best interest to meet with her to see where our interests converge. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | Hazanui Karū's office is at the back of Imperial Command. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I've met with the hazanui. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | The Royal Deadfire Company wants nothing more to do with me, so I won't be reporting back to them anytime soon. |}
title: The Brass Empire
